item.title: Wamma
item.description: Wamma is a Danian Mandiblor and the most iconic Creature of his Tribe

item.title: Wamma, Flame Guard
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Common 50 1         70 65 40 25 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'4.5"Weight 702 lbsEyes Cornflower Blue Skin Dark-orange Persimmon Loyalty Danians   With the ascension of Aszil, the Young Queen to the Danian throne after the abdication of his mother, Queen Illexia, while on an expedition for territorial expansion northwards, the Danians unintentionally excavated the Tremor Gate in the vicinities of Silchaw’s Mine.

item.title: Wamma, Hive Ordnance
item.description: Rarity Energy Mugicians Super Rare 50 0         55 45 65 35 Elements         Biography Gender MaleHeight 7'4.5"Weight 702 lbsEyes Cornflower Blue Skin Dark-orange Persimmon Loyalty Danians Preferred Locations Mount Pillar   In the Animation, starting with the M’arrillian Invasion, Wamma has been reassigned to the ordnance branch of the Danian armed forces.
